pageTitle: Maroon Tide posts another shutout | GalaxGazette.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {30908=With 1:12 left on the clock, Mazon walked to the line with 62 yards between him and the end zone., 33356=Gal–George 63 pass from Mazon (Wright kick) 9:38, 31022=The Galax senior took a quick three-step drop and released the ball down the right side line. Deion George had an easy two steps on the Trojan defender and collected the ball in full stride. Forty-four yards later, George was knocked out of bounds and in a matter of seconds the Tide was knocking on the door of another touchdown., 33244=Gal–George 18 pass from Mazon (Wright kick) 0:48, 33138=Gal–Vaughan 11 run (pass good) 6:45, 34564=PASSING–Alleghany, Hoffman 5-18-1-77, Caudill 1-2-0-4. Galax, Mazon 8-15-0-180, Pack 0-1-0-0., 43053=Copyright © 2015 The Galax Gazette is your source for local news, sports, events and information in Galax, Grayson, Carroll, and surrounding areas., 33037=Gal–Vaughan 2 run (kick failed) 0:28, 32027=The extra point put the Tide up 35-0 at 9:39 of the third., 33190=Gal–Vaughan 19 run (Wright kick) 2:42, 29583=The Tide needed 13 plays and just 5:15 to go 86 yards and put its first six points on the board. Vaughan, who carried 17 times for 137 yards, crossed the goal line for the first time after barreling over two Trojan defenders for the final 2 yards. , 30237=The turnover gave the Tide a first down on the Trojan 11-yard line. One play and nine seconds later, Vaughan crossed the line for his second touchdown of the evening. Terrance Mazon found Vaughan for the two-point conversion pass and Galax led 14-0 with 6:45 left to play in the half., 30538=Following a punt, the Tide took over on the Trojan 42-yard line and pounded the ball on the ground again. Vaughan carried on four of the five plays, including the final 19 yards and the Tide extended its lead to 21-0., 29035=The Tide (2-0) started the season with back-to-back wins for the first time since 2002 with a second straight shut-out., 29853=After trading possessions—including a stalled drive inside the Trojan 5-yard-line for the Tide—Alleghany made a questionable call and paid the price. The Trojans—facing a fourth and five from their own 11-yard-line—tried to catch Galax sleeping and faked a punt. Galax’s defense wasn’t fooled and quickly tackled Ryan Billings as he tried to reach the outside corner., 32488=Galax moved to 2-0 on the season and has allowed zero points in the opening eight quarters of the 2010 season., 31812=Starting on its own 12-yard-line, the Tide needed just five plays and 2:14 to score. George hauled in a Mazon pass and quickly scooted 63 yards to the end zone for his second touchdown of the night.}
